name: com.unity.live-capture
description: Use the Live Capture package to connect to the Unity Virtual Camera and Unity Face Capture companion apps to capture and record camera motion and face performances.

samples.description: A simple face for demonstrating face mocap from ARKit. Requires material upgrade if using with URP or HDRP.

_upm.changelog:
### Fixed
- Compilation error when having Cinemachine 3.X and Live Capture in a URP project
